text:
🎛️Located behind McDonald's Jurong Ctl Pk, Luda Garden features a life-size Luda board that is laid with coloured rubberised tiles travel path.
🕸️Sadly, the play area is a little past its prime time.
🛩️Luda is a board game for 2 to 4 players, where the objective is to move all 4 tokens (airplanes) from start (hanger) to finish (home) by the throw of dice.
🎲Whoever is the first to move all 4 tokens to home, wins.
♟️Ludo (Western version), is developed from Pachisi.
🎠It is a childhood game popularly played by the Merdeka Generations.
✈️It's similiar to Aeroplane Chess
飞行棋.(Chinese version. Popular in SE Asia)
🇮🇳Luda is based on an Indian game of Pachisi. (Indian version. Origin)
